name: Astro-Fire (zoromoth)
description:
Astro-Fire is a minimalistic arcade space shooter with 8 bit audio. You will encounter a swarm of enemy and have to fire from a turret. This game has been made completely in C++. Please do try and rate the game! 

Important**********************************************************************

Please download and install vcredistx64 followed by Astro-Fire.msi. If it shows an error then, it is present on your computer. In this case kindly, proceed with the installation of Astro-Fire.msi

********************************************************************************

Please do try and rate the game!!!
